summary: A lonely kindergarten teacher discovers a secret well in the basement of her house, and soon finds herself being followed by a murderous Satanic cult.
cast: Kelly Curtis|Herbert Lom|Mariangela Giordano|Michel Adatte|Carla Cassola|Angelika Maria Boeck|Giovanni Lombardo Radice|Niels Gullov|Tomas Arana|Donald O'Brien|Yasmine Ussani|Dario Casalini|Paolo Pranzo|Richard Sammel|Ralph Bola Mustapha|Erika Sinisi|Fabio Saccani|Vincent Regina|Giovanna Rotellini|Chiara Mancori|Carmela Pilato|Daria Nicolodi|Michele Soavi
title: La secta
